location.Description: The location of the device. This is a supported and registered Azure geographical region (for example, West US, East US, or Southeast Asia). The geographical region of a device cannot be changed once it is created, but if an identical geographical region is specified on update, the request will succeed.

tags.Description: The list of tags that describe the device. These tags can be used to view and group this device (across resource groups).

properties.Description: The properties of the Data Box Edge/Gateway device.

tier.Description: The SKU tier. This is based on the SKU name.

dataBoxEdgeDeviceStatus.Description: The status of the Data Box Edge/Gateway device.

serialNumber.Description: The Serial Number of Data Box Edge/Gateway device.

description.Description: The Description of the Data Box Edge/Gateway device.

modelDescription.Description: The description of the Data Box Edge/Gateway device model.

deviceType.Description: The type of the Data Box Edge/Gateway device.

friendlyName.Description: The Data Box Edge/Gateway device name.

culture.Description: The Data Box Edge/Gateway device culture.

deviceModel.Description: The Data Box Edge/Gateway device model.

deviceSoftwareVersion.Description: The Data Box Edge/Gateway device software version.

deviceLocalCapacity.Description: The Data Box Edge/Gateway device local capacity in MB.

timeZone.Description: The Data Box Edge/Gateway device timezone.

deviceHcsVersion.Description: The device software version number of the device (eg: 1.2.18105.6).

nodeCount.Description: The number of nodes in the cluster.

properties.Description: The properties of the bandwidth schedule.

start.Description: The start time of the schedule in UTC.

stop.Description: The stop time of the schedule in UTC.

days.Description: The days of the week when this schedule is applicable.

orderHistory.Description: List of status changes in the order.

deliveryTrackingInfo.Description: Tracking information for the package delivered to the customer whether it has an original or a replacement device.

returnTrackingInfo.Description: Tracking information for the package returned from the customer whether it has an original or a replacement device.

status.Description: Status of the order as per the allowed status types.

comments.Description: Comments related to this status change.

serialNumber.Description: Serial number of the device being tracked.

carrierName.Description: Name of the carrier used in the delivery.

hostPlatform.Description: Host OS supported by the IoT role.

ioTDeviceDetails.Description: IoT device metadata to which data box edge device needs to be connected.

ioTEdgeDeviceDetails.Description: IoT edge device to which the IoT role needs to be configured.

shareMappings.Description: Mount points of shares in role(s).

deviceId.Description: ID of the IoT device/edge device.

ioTHostHub.Description: Host name for the IoT hub associated to the device.

ioTHostHubId.Description: Id of the IoT hub associated to the device.

connectionString.Description: Connection string based on the symmetric key.

encryptionCertThumbprint.Description: Thumbprint certificate used to encrypt \"Value\". If the value is unencrypted, it will be null.

shareId.Description: ID of the share mounted to the role VM.

roleId.Description: ID of the role to which share is mounted.

monitoringStatus.Description: Current monitoring status of the share.

azureContainerInfo.Description: Azure container mapping for the share.

accessProtocol.Description: Access protocol to be used by the share.

userAccessRights.Description: Mapping of users and corresponding access rights on the share (required for SMB protocol).

clientAccessRights.Description: List of IP addresses and corresponding access rights on the share(required for NFS protocol).

refreshDetails.Description: Details of the refresh job on this share.

shareMappings.Description: Share mount point to the role.

storageAccountCredentialId.Description: ID of the storage account credential used to access storage.

containerName.Description: Container name (Based on the data format specified, this represents the name of Azure Files/Page blob/Block blob).

dataFormat.Description: Storage format used for the file represented by the share.

userId.Description: User ID (already existing in the device).

accessType.Description: Type of access to be allowed for the user.

accessPermission.Description: Type of access to be allowed for the client.

inProgressRefreshJobId.Description: If a refresh share job is currently in progress on this share, this field indicates the ARM resource ID of that job. The field is empty if no job is in progress.

lastCompletedRefreshJobTimeInUTC.Description: Indicates the completed time for the last refresh job on this particular share, if any.This could be a failed job or a successful job.

errorManifestFile.Description: Indicates the relative path of the error xml for the last refresh job on this particular share, if any. This could be a failed job or a successful job.

lastJob.Description: Indicates the id of the last refresh job on this particular share,if any. This could be a failed job or a successful job.

connectionString.Description: Connection string for the storage account. Use this string if username and account key are not specified.

sslStatus.Description: Signifies whether SSL needs to be enabled or not.

blobDomainName.Description: Blob end point for private clouds.

accountType.Description: Type of storage accessed on the storage account.

customContextTag.Description: A custom context tag typically used to correlate the trigger against its usage. For example, if a periodic timer trigger is intended for certain specific IoT modules in the device, the tag can be the name or the image URL of the module.

A custom context tag typically used to correlate the trigger against its usage. For example, if a periodic timer trigger is intended for certain specific IoT modules in the device, the tag can be the name or the image URL of the module.

startTime.Description: The time of the day that results in a valid trigger. Schedule is computed with reference to the time specified upto seconds. If timezone is not specified the time will considered to be in device timezone. The value will always be returned as UTC time.

schedule.Description: Periodic frequency at which timer event needs to be raised. Supports daily, hourly, minutes, and seconds.

topic.Description: Topic where periodic events are published to IoT device.

shareAccessRights.Description: List of shares that the user has rights on. This field should not be specified during user creation.

accessType.Description: Type of access to be allowed on the share for this user.

properties.Description: The properties of network settings of a device.

networkAdapters.Description: The network adapter list on the device.

nodeId.Description: Node ID of the network adapter.

status.Description: Value indicating whether this adapter is valid.

rdmaStatus.Description: Value indicating whether this adapter is RDMA capable.

dhcpStatus.Description: Value indicating whether this adapter has DHCP enabled.

ipv4Configuration.Description: The IPv4 configuration of the network adapter.

ipv6Configuration.Description: The IPv6 configuration of the network adapter.

dnsServers.Description: The list of DNS Servers of the device.

ipAddress.Description: The IPv4 address of the network adapter.

subnet.Description: The IPv4 subnet of the network adapter.

gateway.Description: The IPv4 gateway of the network adapter.

ipAddress.Description: The IPv6 address of the network adapter.

prefixLength.Description: The IPv6 prefix of the network adapter.

gateway.Description: The IPv6 gateway of the network adapter.

deviceVersionNumber.Description: The current version of the device in format: 1.2.17312.13.",

friendlyDeviceVersionName.Description: The current version of the device in text format.

deviceLastScannedDateTime.Description: The last time when a scan was done on the device.

lastCompletedScanJobDateTime.Description: The time when the last scan job was completed (success/cancelled/failed) on the appliance.

lastCompletedDownloadJobDateTime.Description: The time when the last Download job was completed (success/cancelled/failed) on the appliance.

lastCompletedInstallJobDateTime.Description: The time when the last Install job was completed (success/cancelled/failed) on the appliance.

totalNumberOfUpdatesAvailable.Description: The number of updates available for the current device version as per the last device scan.

totalNumberOfUpdatesPendingDownload.Description: The total number of items pending download.

totalNumberOfUpdatesPendingInstall.Description: The total number of items pending install.

rebootBehavior.Description: Indicates if updates are available and at least one of the updates needs a reboot.

inProgressDownloadJobId.Description: The job ID of the download job in progress.

inProgressInstallJobId.Description: The job ID of the install job in progress.

inProgressDownloadJobStartedDateTime.Description: The time when the currently running download (if any) started.

inProgressInstallJobStartedDateTime.Description: The time when the currently running install (if any) started.

updateTitles.Description: The list of updates available for install.

totalUpdateSizeInBytes.Description: The total size of updates available for download in bytes.

appearedAtDateTime.Description: UTC time when the alert appeared.
